backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, messaging, calls, friends, and blob storage with authorization and various types and state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing light/dark mode OKLCH color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, theme provider, and profile setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a chat message bubble with reply previews, timestamps, and optional video content.
frontend/src/components/chat/VideoMessag: Displays a video message with loading state, playback, and star rating functionality.
frontend/src/components/common/Avatar.ts: Shows a user avatar using profile picture blob URL or a default image with size options.
Defines the main application shell with top bar, user dropdown, bottom navigation, and routing-aware navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Provides a dialog for selecting or capturing a profile picture and uploading it to update the user's profile.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal to create initial user profile with username and display name, calling the save profile hook.
frontend/src/components/ratings/StarRati: Implements an interactive 1–5 star rating component with hover, half-star support, and optional read-only mode.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoRecor: Displays a modal for recording a video via the device camera and passing the captured result to a callback.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoTrimm: Shows a simple UI for previewing and selecting trim points for a recorded video before sending the original blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating the current user's profile and profile picture via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInboxFriendProfile: Fetches and maps friend profiles in parallel using React Query and the backend actor, returning a principal-to-profile map.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for messaging, calls, friends, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoRatings.ts: Implements a mock localStorage‑based video rating hook with submit and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CallsPage.tsx: Renders call history, pending calls, and UI to initiate or respond to calls using related hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ChatDetailPage.tsx: Displays a chat thread with messaging, replies, video recording support, and auto‑scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Renders the friends list with add/remove/best-friend actions and a search dialog for finding new friends.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Displays a list of friends as message threads, loading their profiles and linking to chat pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the current user's profile with editable username, display name, and profile picture.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides theme settings including dark mode and theme color updates synced to the user profile.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity sign‑in with loading and error states.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Manages global theme state, syncing dark mode and theme color to the user's profile and applying them to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/blob.ts: Converts File or Blob objects into ExternalBlob instances using byte extraction.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores high-level project state, including app summary, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented feature definitions.
